title: Baskin Robbins - Quick Facts
text:

title: Baskin Robbins
text: Baskin Robbins is an ice-cream parlour located on the Scholars' Avenue next to Heritage and Cafe Coffee Day .

title: Facilities and cuisines
text: The place has a facility to sit for 8 people with extra chains put outside occasionally by the staff.

title: Menu
text:
• Icecreams Mississippi Mud Bavarian Chocolate Black Currant and 28 others
• Hot Fudge, and others
